item.title: Wall Street rises toward records as Verizon begins a big week for profit reports with a beat

item.title: Off-duty Border Patrol agent shot in a Manhattan park in apparent botched robbery, police say
item.description: A U.S. Customs and Border Protection officer has been shot in a Manhattan park in what authorities say was an apparent botched robbery
